tool_description:
[ ID ] 
Menampilkan data harga Emas terbaru.

[ EN ]
Displays the latest Gold price data.

[ SOURCE ] 
https://www.anekalogam.co.id/
name: Harga Emas Antam
title: Harga Emas Antam

api_list.name: Get Harga Emas
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://harga-emas-antam.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harga-emas-antam.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://harga-emas-antam.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harga-emas-antam.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
